comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Derby 10.4.2.1 is not yet released and I'd rather not do a more major dependency upgrade in a Jackrabbit patch release, so removing this from the 1.6.3 release plan.

comments.author: Paco Avila
comments.body: So, how can use Jackrabbit 1.6.2 under JBoss?

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Since this dependency upgrade shouldn't cause any unexpected problems for downstream projects I decided to upgrade the Derby version to 10.5.3.0_1 for Jackrabbit 1.6.4. Done in revision 998299.

description:
JBoss fails to start due to a bug in Derby-10.4.2.0. The dependency should be agains derby-10.4.2.1 which seems to has this bug fixed. More info at https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/DERBY-3887

Please, include this fix in the upcoming 1.6.3
summary: Embedded Derby fails under JBoss because of JMX-related conflicts
